title: Fragments, 14th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal wrappd linen
Technique: two interconnected structures (plain weave plus plain weave)
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 13.3 x 44.5 cm (5 1/4 x 17 1/2 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 11.1 x 45.1 cm (4 3/8 x 17 3/4 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 12.4 x 6.2 cm (4 7/8 x 2 7/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (d): 11.7 x 6.4 cm (4 5/8 x 2 1/2 in.)
description: Horizontal rows of animals and birds on beige ground; metallic deer, blue silk bird and head of another bird at the bottom.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, 14th century.
14th century. Medium: silk, metal wrappd linen
Technique: two interconnected structures (plain weave plus plain weave). Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-231-a/d.
